meanings.sent1: The hiker was snakebit after encountering a venomous snake on the trail.
meanings.sent2: The farmer's hand was snakebit when he accidentally disturbed a snake in the barn.
meanings.sent3: The snakebit camper learned to always watch where they step in the wilderness.
meanings.sent4: The snakebit victim's arm swelled up like a balloon after the bite.
meanings.sent5: The snakebit dog whimpered in pain as the vet treated the wound.

meanings.sent1: She felt snakebit when her car broke down on the way to the job interview.
meanings.sent2: The team seemed snakebit as they missed every shot in the game.
meanings.sent3: He joked that he must be snakebit when he spilled coffee on his shirt right before the meeting.
meanings.sent4: The snakebit student lost their homework on the day it was due.
meanings.sent5: The snakebit traveler missed their flight by just a minute.
